name: Cybur
description:
Overview

Play as a computer hacker defending your network against malicious hackers through the new Cybur application that you made. The program makes it easier to detect intrusions, but you need to be fast in order to stop them. If you let to many through, you will be compromised. Click your way through the defense application and achieve the highest hacker rating possible! Careful, the higher your rating, the harder the intrusions become.

Controls

  • WASD - Move "character" around
  • Mouse Left Click - Destroy hack attempt
  • SPACE - Increase rating booster (must line up the two indicators at the bottom to get the multiplier)

Credits

  • RadethDart - Graphics, Programming, Game Design, Sfx, Animation
  • SoundCloud - Music

Future Updates

  • GameJolt Leaderboard Submissions
